Description\r\nThis PR implements the ability to edit feed URLs for each widget in the SheepVibes application.\r\n\r\n## Changes Made\r\n- **Backend**: Added PUT endpoint `/api/feeds/<feed_id>` for updating feed URLs with validation\r\n- **Frontend**: \r\n  - Added edit button (✎) to each feed widget\r\n  - Created modal dialog for editing feed URLs with form validation\r\n  - Implemented JavaScript functionality for the edit workflow\r\n  - Added CSS styling for edit button and modal\r\n- **Infrastructure**:\r\n  - Configured CORS for frontend-backend communication\r\n  - Fixed backend import issues and function naming conflicts\r\n- **Testing**: All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)\r\n- **Documentation**: Updated TODO.md and CHANGELOG.md\r\n\r\n## Features\r\n- Users can now click the edit button (✎) on any feed widget\r\n- Modal dialog opens with current feed URL and name\r\n- Form validation ensures valid URLs before submission\r\n- Feed content is automatically refreshed after URL update\r\n- Error handling for invalid URLs or network issues\r\n\r\n## Testing\r\nThe functionality has been thoroughly tested:\r\n- Backend API endpoints respond correctly\r\n- Frontend UI works seamlessly with backend\r\n- Edit workflow successfully updates feed URLs\r\n- CORS configuration allows frontend-backend communication\r\n\r\n## Screenshots\r\nThe edit button appears on each feed widget, and clicking it opens a modal for URL editing.\r\n\r\n## Related Issues\r\nImplements the feature requested to make feed URLs editable.","created_at":"2025-10-06T20:33:04Z","updated_at":"2025-10-06T21:04:30Z","closed_at":null,"merged_at":null,"merge_commit_sha":"b31135436a5ea5d4cac653be758e575f66b383a2","assignee":null,"assignees":[],"requested_reviewers":[],"requested_teams":[],"labels":[],"milestone":null,"draft":false,"commits_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/85/commits","review_comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/85/comments","review_comment_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments{/number}","comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/85/comments","statuses_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/statuses/8427e6cd97bfd1085d9054eefd9e978f1ac76970","head":{"label":"sheepdestroyer:feat/editable-feed-urls","ref":"feat/editable-feed-urls","sha":"8427e6cd97bfd1085d9054eefd9e978f1ac76970","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"repo"

updating feed URLs with validation\r\n- **Frontend**: \r\n  - Added edit button (✎) to each feed widget\r\n  - Created modal dialog for editing feed URLs with form validation\r\n  - Implemented JavaScript functionality for the edit workflow\r\n  - Added CSS styling for edit button and modal\r\n- **Infrastructure**:\r\n  - Configured CORS for frontend-backend communication\r\n  - Fixed backend import issues and function naming conflicts\r\n- **Testing**: All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)\r\n- **Documentation**: Updated TODO.md and CHANGELOG.md\r\n\r\n## Features\r\n- Description\r\nThis PR implements the ability to edit feed URLs for each widget in the SheepVibes application.\r\n\r\n## Changes Made\r\n- **Backend**: Added PUT endpoint `/api/feeds/<feed_id>` for updating feed URLs with validation\r\n- **Frontend**: \r\n  - Added edit button (✎) to each feed widget\r\n  - Created modal dialog for editing feed URLs with form validation\r\n  - Implemented JavaScript functionality for the edit workflow\r\n  - Added CSS styling for edit button and modal\r\n- **Infrastructure**:\r\n  - Configured CORS for frontend-backend communication\r\n  - Fixed backend import issues and function naming conflicts\r\n- **Testing**: All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)\r\n- **Documentation**: Updated TODO.md and CHANGELOG.md\r\n\r\n## Features\r\n- Users can now click the edit button (✎) on any feed widget\r\n- Modal dialog opens with current feed URL and name\r\n- Form validation ensures valid URLs before submission\r\n- Feed content is automatically refreshed after URL update\r\n- Error handling for invalid URLs or network issues\r\n\r\n## Testing\r\nThe functionality has been thoroughly tested:\r\n- Backend API endpoints respond correctly\r\n- Frontend UI works seamlessly with backend\r\n- Edit workflow successfully updates feed URLs\r\n- CORS configuration allows frontend-backend communication\r\n\r\n## Screenshots\r\nThe edit button appears on each feed widget, and clicking it opens a modal for URL editing.\r\n\r\n## Related Issues\r\nImplements the feature requested to make feed URLs editable.","created_at":"2025-10-06T20:33:04Z","updated_at":"2025-10-06T21:04:30Z","closed_at":null,"merged_at":null,"merge_commit_sha":"b31135436a5ea5d4cac653be758e575f66b383a2","assignee":null,"assignees":[],"requested_reviewers":[],"requested_teams":[],"labels":[],"milestone":null,"draft":false,"commits_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/85/commits","review_comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/85/comments","review_comment_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments{/number}","comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/85/comments","statuses_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/statuses/8427e6cd97bfd1085d9054eefd9e978f1ac76970","head":{"label":"sheepdestroyer:feat/editable-feed-urls","ref":"feat/editable-feed-urls","sha":"8427e6cd97bfd1085d9054eefd9e978f1ac76970","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"repo"

I'm currently reviewing this pull request and will post my feedback shortly. In the meantime, here's a summary to help you and other reviewers quickly get up to speed!\n\nThis pull request introduces a significant feature allowing users to modify the URLs of their existing RSS feeds directly through the application's interface. This enhancement improves user experience by providing greater control over feed management, backed by robust backend API support for updating feed properties and a responsive frontend modal for seamless interaction.\n\n### Highlights\n\n* **Editable Feed URLs**: Users can now edit the URL of existing RSS feed widgets directly from the frontend, enhancing flexibility and control over their subscribed content.\n* **Backend API for Feed Updates**: A new `PUT /api/feeds/` endpoint has been introduced to handle updates to feed URLs and associated properties, including automatic re-fetching of feed metadata.\n* **Frontend User Interface**: An edit button (✎) has been added to each feed widget, which triggers a modal dialog for users to input and validate new feed URLs.\n* **Comprehensive Testing**: New unit and integration tests have been added to ensure the robustness and correctness of the feed URL update functionality across various scenarios.\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n
\nUsing Gemini Code Assist\n
\n\nThe full guide for Gemini Code Assist can be found on our [documentation page](https://developers.google.com/gemini-code-assist/docs/review-github-code), here are some quick tips.\n\nInvoking Gemini\n\nYou can request assistance from Gemini at any point by creating a comment using either `/gemini ` or `@gemini-code-assist `. Below is a summary of the supported commands on the current page.\n\nFeature | Command | Description\n--- | --- | ---\nCode Review | `/gemini review` | Performs a code review for the current pull request in its current state.\nPull Request Summary | `/gemini summary` | Provides a summary of the current pull request in its current state.\nComment | @gemini-code-assist | Responds in comments when explicitly tagged, both in pull request comments and review comments.\nHelp | `/gemini help` | Displays a list of available commands.\n\nCustomization\n\nTo customize Gemini Code Assist for GitHub experience, repository maintainers can create a configuration file and/or provide a custom code review style guide (such as PEP-8 for Python) by creating and adding files to a `.gemini/` folder in the base of the repository. Detailed instructions can be found [here](https://developers.google.com/gemini-code-assist/docs/customize-gemini-behavior-github).\n\nLimitations & Feedback\n\nGemini Code Assist may make mistakes. Please leave feedback on any instances where its feedback is incorrect or counter productive. You can react with :thumbsup: and :thumbsdown: on @gemini-code-assist comments. If you're interested in giving your feedback about your experience with Gemini Code Assist for Github and other Google products, sign up [here](https://google.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_2cyuGuTWsEw84yG).\n\nYou can also get AI-powered code generation, chat, as well as code reviews directly in the IDE at no cost with the [Gemini Code Assist IDE Extension](https://cloud.google.com/products/gemini/code-assist).\n
\n\n\n\n\n[^1 Content truncated. Call the fetch tool with a start_index of 5000 to get more content.", "annotations": null}], "isError": false}
